message: (question: how do I post a picture?)

Hi guys, following some of your advices (https://convore.com/uiux-discussion/please-critique-my-websites-design-taskarmy/), I have updated the layout and landing page of TaskArmy. I would love to hear your feedback. Thanks!
the contents.... i felt dirty after reading http://taskarmy.com/tasks/300-get-you-5-000-backlinks-in-valid-verified-forum-profiles-and-post
the site itself not too bad, not a fan of the top banner... a bit spammie / parked (if i don't scroll down)..
@unwrangle Hi, thanks for the feedback about TaskArmy.com. What is the top banner you are talking about? "Outsourcing for online businesses"?
@unwrangle This is important feedback. I don't realize how dirty it is after seeing much worse during the approval process of the services...
@AymericG yes the "Outsourcing for online businesses" portion... try open your site on a smaller screen (i'm on a 13" mb)
